Topic.Title: Published "Reencuentro" for 2023 Edition of Spanish "Rayuela de Arena" Jam

Posts.EditableText: I've just published "Reencuentro", a short sci-fi Squiffy spanish interactive fiction work: Exploring a new world, you must meet with the takeoff module. But the road to reunion is not always short or easy. It was created (rather in a hurry) to enter this year edition of the spanish "Rayuela de Arena" jam: if you want to sample the current spanish interactive fiction, check the published entries on early June, when the Jam voting period begins and all of the contestants will be published. Anyway, I welcome any and all of your comments, here at textadventures.co.uk or at itch.io: you may also check out it's webpage that also links to the rest of my interactive fiction works. Kind regards, [INCANUS]
Posts.HTML:
I've just published "Reencuentro", a short sci-fi Squiffy spanish interactive fiction work:

Exploring a new world, you must meet with the takeoff module. But the road to reunion is not always short or easy.

It was created (rather in a hurry) to enter this year edition of the spanish "Rayuela de Arena" jam: if you want to sample the current spanish interactive fiction, check the published entries on early June, when the Jam voting period begins and all of the contestants will be published.

Anyway, I welcome any and all of your comments, here at textadventures.co.uk or at itch.io: you may also check out it's webpage that also links to the rest of my interactive fiction works.

Kind regards,

[INCANUS]
